text: Soldiers () is a 1956 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Ivanov.«Папе обещали голливудские условия»Солдаты It stars Vsevolod Safonov, Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy, and Tamara Loginova. == Actors == * Vsevolod Safonov as Kerzhentsev * Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy * Tamara Loginova * Leonid Kmit * Nikolay Pogodin * Oleg Dashkevich as Soldier == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1956 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Soldiers (movie)
